text: @senatemajldr @LindseyGrahamSC How about addressing real life the American people deem as important-like the COVID19 effects on economy-everyone is hurting from the American workers,small businesses and hospitals. People do not have food,money to pay bills-dying from Virus & you are worried about what?Pathetic
